title: Bokusatsu Tenshi Complete 1. OAV + Bokusatsu Tenshi 2 1+2
description:
It&#039;s the complete 1. OAV and the first two episodes of the 2. one - as soon as there are some fansubs of the further episodes (and I find them) I&#039;ll upload them as well.

If you just stumbled upon this: Bokusatsu Tenshi Dokuro chan is an anime with a rather random kind of humor. Basicilly the main joke is about the main character getting brutally killed and revived. If you do not want to download (yet) I&#039;d recommend this site for streaming:- just search for it there.

last time i checked I couldn&#039;t find the first episode with english subs anymore, though. Also on the site you can find many different languages subbed (spanish and german for example).
